content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ CIS Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Benchmark scanning now available July 23, 2025—Trend Vision One now supports compliance scanning with CIS Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Benchmark version 1.7.0 in your Microsoft AKS clusters. Assess and guarantee adherence to industry-leading security standards effortlessly, enhancing your Kubernetes security posture. For more information, see Compliance. Cloud Security → Container Security → Container Protection © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: CIS Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Benchmark scanning now available
